entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gretna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:43 a.m. CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
